warning.invalidCategorySkipped: Cataloger skipped invalid PMD Category file '%s'.
warning.invalidRulesetSkipped: Cataloger skipped invalid PMD Ruleset file '%s'.
warning.xmlDropped: Dropping XML file [%s] since its path does not conform to Rulesets or Category.

internal.jsonWriteFailed: Failed to write JSON to file: %s

external.multipleRuleDesc: PMD Rule [%s] has %s 'description' elements. Please reduce this number to 1.
